short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to GitHub PR pages to copy PR details.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a button to the title of your GitHub pull request so you can easily copy it with title & url for sharing (on Slack, for example). 

After pasting into Slack, press CMD + SHIFT + F to format the text, converting the markdown to rich text
